data.name: GUNSdemo
data.description:
Welcome to shooting at our friendly, target-rich farm! Try some of the weapons from the full game GUNS (handguns, rifle, and shotgun), toss a grenade or sneak with the suppressor!
Experimental option to support ForceTube force feedback hardware via Bluetooth.

Short and long ranges with:
- plinking targets,
- scoring targets,
- clay pigeons,
- some chickens,
- a scarecrow and a hog,
- a small 3-gun range,
and more!

The full game is GUNS: www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/8960111530681079/ - 22 weapons including full auto, optics, suppressors, scarecrows that attack, and more!

Use the shot timer or shoot at leisure! Accurate ballistics (per ammunition type) and loading mechanics.

This free alpha demo includes a limited selection of guns and ammunition. Install size is around 125 MB. 120 Hz works on the Quest 2 and 3 if enabled there in Settings! All comments are welcome - see reddit.com/r/gunsgame for bug reports, ideas, or general questions!

Privacy note: the Meta store states that the app may access followers who also use the app. We do NOT do this - the only time user ID is used is for a link to see the full game in the Meta store. No user data is stored or transmitted by this app.

Also tested on Quest 1.

changelog.change_log:
V. 0.410
- Added a game reset button,
- Added a hog,
- Experimental support for ForceTube hardware,
- Tweaks for performance.

V. 0.406: In this small Halloween update:
* A couple of M67 hand grenades,
* A suppressor,
* A pumpkin.

V. 0.402:
- New scarecrow target,
- Recoil simulation improvements.

V. 0.401:
- Made pistols easier to pick up without accidentally grabbing slide
- New link to full game store page
- Put in a few round targets

V. 0.393
Full version of GUNS now on App Lab, with more guns, targets, and sights! 
Various bug fixes in the demo. 
Added red dot sight to M1911.

Update 0.311: Control changes!

X/A buttons now drop the magazine, and do easy reload on second press.

Right joystick is for turning, and clicking it will switch between smooth and snap turns. Moved drop mag/reload function to X/A buttons (see above).

Joystick-back still operates the slide.

Shot timer is now started by left joystick click.

Issues fixed: mag drops and reloads are now working as they should for separate weapons in each hand.

Known issues: * joystick slide operation may move the player slightly if joystick movement is enabled.

0.306: Improvements!

- Left joystick movement: smooth turn now available by clicking the joystick.

- Joystick weapon control: reload and make ready by moving the joystick right. Control the slide by moving the joystick down.

- Visuals: the SPAS-12 stock now looks more realistic.

- General: Preferences for ambient sound, ammo, and joystick movement are now saved.

Update 0.291: Moved the controller grabbing areas to give a more intuitive feel!

Let me know how you like this and the new joystick movement at reddit.com/r/gunsgame/.

"Version 0.285: Joystick movement now enabled!

The left joystick now moves you in the controller direction. This can be turned off or on at the farmhouse options board. Let me know how you like this (speed, controller vs. gaze direction...) at reddit.com/r/gunsgame/. 

Known issues: with this option on, dropping a mag from a gun in the left hand will move you slightly left.
